title: Montmartre Apartement with a private terrace
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


1 bedroom apartment fully renovated with a private terrace on the hill of Montmartre . 
1 bedroom with 2 windows, Living room / kitchen with 2 windows, and all appliances incl Diswasher, stove , induction cooking table, washing machine, Walk in shower and WC.
High speed internet . Fully furnished .
Available for 3 to 12-month rental contract.
